statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 8 \\ -1 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -26 \\ -11 \\ 34 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
